docs.snippet: Helicopters will circle overhead starting at 6 a.m. to spot any floating rubbish. Below, trash-collection boats receiving GPS coordinates will sweep up debris before each day of Olympic sailing kicks off in Rio de Janeiro's Guanabara Bay....

docs.snippet: Gretchen Carlson said that after she refused sexual advances by Roger Ailes, the network chief, he curtailed her airtime and later declined to renew her contract. Fox said it is investigating Mr. Ailes, who denied the allegations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gretchen Carlson said that after she refused sexual advances by Roger Ailes, the network chief, he curtailed her airtime and later declined to renew her contract. Fox said it is investigating Mr. Ailes, who denied the allegations.
docs.abstract: Lawsuit filed by former Fox News employee Gretchen Carslon accuses chariman Roger Ailes of sexual harassment and of forcing her out of organization for rejecting his advances; allegations represent startling public denouncement of perhaps most powerful man in television news.

headline.main: Gretchen Carlson of Fox News Files Harassment Suit Against Roger Ailes
headline.print_headline: Anchor Ousted at Fox News Accuses Chief of Harassment
